| History                 = The Napolitano Family was a crime family with branches in both Italy and the United States. In Italy the family had a conflict with the [[Camorra Family (Earth-616)|Camorra Family]]{{r|Punisher: Red X-Mas Vol 1 1}}{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 11|; [[Suspiria (Earth-616)|Suspiria]]'s entry}} The American branch had it's leadership annihilated by the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]]. Seeking revenge and fearing the loss of their children and their own lives, five widows hired [[Suspiria (Earth-616)|Suspiria]] to eliminate the Punisher, which she failed. He found the wives and killed [[Regina Napolitano (Earth-616)|Regina Napolitano]] the ringleader. The Punisher spared the other 4 widows, gave them 24 hours to leave the city, and demanded that they make a X-Mas contribution which they all did.{{r|Punisher: Red X-Mas Vol 1 1}}
